title: Japan Okayama City Hotel with Rail Access & Rooftop Bar
description: At the heart of a city famed for fruit and foliage, ANA Crowne Plaza Okayama, an IHG Hotel, is the ideal location from which to explore this city in full bloom. Explore beautiful gardens and marvel at heritage castles. Savour local street foods and delicacies such as kibi dango, or dine on refined Japanese cuisine onsite at Kuriya-Sen. Once night falls, sip a stylish cocktail while being serenaded by soothing music at the Sen Sky Bar & Lounge or retire in comfort to your lavish guest room or suite.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Okayama, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Kita-Ku 15-1 Ekimoto-Machi, Kita Ward, Okayama 700-0024, Japan
